infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: D.A.W.G. uses the camera with on-device face detection to verify you stay present and track stillness during focus sessions. No face data is stored or shared.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: D.A.W.G. needs microphone access to record verification videos during focus sessions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: D.A.W.G. needs photo library access to save your session videos and share cards.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: D.A.W.G. needs permission to save your session verification videos and selfie share cards to your photo library.
